name: oanda-openapi
description: OANDA REST API V20 openapi definition
author: Gergely Rem√©nyi <geri@geriremenyi.com>

scripts.generate:csharp-netcore: npm run validate && npm run merge && openapi-generator generate -i out/definition/openapi.yaml -g csharp-netcore -o out/code/csharp-netcore -c config/csharp-netcore.json
